trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Clifton Park
There were no other sightings in Clifton Park on or around November 13th 2000
Summary: Hovering, triangle shaped, five large nonflashing.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home when I came upon an object that was triangular in shape. Theoutside was black and in a V shape were five large, nonblinking, white lights. The object appeared to be stationary as I came to a stop to get a better look atsame, the object did not move. It was much larger than an aircraft. I continuedon home to get my husband but in the five minutes it had disappeared.
